title: Keltrentt
author: Keltrentt
created_time: May 09, 2023, 07:03:53 PMLast edit: May 10, 2023, 06:57:53 AM by Keltrentt
content: Project Eureka is all about Celebrating Ideas!Satoshi Nakamoto once had an 'eureka' moment which led to the creation of Bitcoin which in turn also resulted into the financial revolution which Cryptocurrency represents today! Several other inventors and innovators have left the world a better place than they met it with the ideas they received at some point in their lives. That's how powerful ideas can be! We believe it's worth celebrating! We also believe that people all around the globe receive ideas on a daily basis. Project Eureka wants to build an idea-sharing platform on web3 where the entire crypto community can come together and socialize and relate with people of like minds with the aim to somehow expand on whatever ideas they may have. We are currently at the point of building the community right now. Everyone who believes in what we're trying to achieve can join us using the links below. Twitter: https://twitter.com/eurekamemeTelegram Group: https://t.me/eurekamemeTelegram Channel: https://t.me/eurekamemeannwebsite: https://eurekatoken.onlineWe are announcing an airdrop on Twitter soon. Follow us on there and turn on your notifications.
